data.title: 以至少 50 个字回答问题
data.content: "A crisis is a time of intense difficulty. Describe ways people recover from a personal crisis (such as losing a job or getting injured)."
data.answer: Nowadays, there can be crises when people have intense difficulty, such as losing a job. The causes of this are various, and several measures need to be taken to change this phenomenon. It is an indisputable fact that people need to recover from this kind of personal crisis as soon as possible. Firstly, people can start by writing their resumes, and followed by that, start looking for jobs on the internet that are suitable for them. Last but not least, people can call the companies directly to ask if they are still hiring. To put it in a nutshell, individuals must work hard to combat these problems. (114 字)
